ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Title: The Death of Snake Eyes, Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary: The Death of Snake Eyes, Part 2: Throwdown climbs aboard the giant robot as Serpentor summons it back to the Pit. Snake Eyes tackles Serpentor with a live grenade, killing them both. Throwdown is badly burned while destroying the robot from the inside and he takes up Snake Eyes' discarded mask to protect his face.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 10:20:26. [Issue ID 1342409]
